desc.en: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.jp: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.

desc.zh_tw: 老師讀了阿拜多斯高中寄來的信後，得知學生們受到暴力組織欺壓的消息，於是便前往阿拜多斯自治區幫助他們，但卻 一下子就迷路遇難了。

desc.en: After taking office for several days, Arona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.

desc.zh_tw: 在上任幾天後，阿羅娜表示許多學生都送來了求助信，而其中一篇則來自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Arona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.

desc.zh_tw: 阿羅娜向老師簡單介紹了一下阿拜多斯當地的情況，並對“阿拜多斯學院”被攻擊一事感到驚異。之後，老師立刻到阿拜多斯自治區出差。

desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.

desc.zh_tw: 老師被白子救出來後，抵達阿拜多斯高中的廢校對策委員會社團活動室。然而當時片方頭盔團卻來攻擊阿拜多斯高中， 於是老師就和學生們一起出面擊退他們。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.zh_tw: 老師在遇見了白子之後，向白子表示自己是來出差的，但苦於找不到路。白子表示周邊地區均已廢棄，並向老師遞能量飲料喝。之後，白子揹著老師到達了學校。

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老師和對策委員會學生們跟蹤茜香，來到她打工的拉麵店。大家吃了拉麵度過愉快的時光，可是茜香依然一副沒好氣的樣子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被頭盔團綁架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.thai: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.ko: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.zh_tw: 老師撞見了茜香，向她親切地問好，並表示想知道她去哪裡、做什麼。茜香躲閃著，但老師步步緊跟；茜香後承認是打工，並要求老師不再跟隨，但老師並沒有聽從。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.

desc.zh_tw: 老師帶著對策委員會的其它人來到了茜香打工的拉麵店，茜香大為震撼。然後，茜香帶領大家就坐；之後，野乃美主動提出結賬，但老師最終還是用大人的卡片結了賬。吃飽後，大家在茜香的難堪與強烈要求下返回了學校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.zh_tw: 綜合從之前的戰鬥中收集到的情報,對策委員會學生查出，<便利屋68>的職員是格黑娜出身的不良學生，以及頭盔團所使用的武器是從<黑市>流入的事實。老師和對策委員會學生為了尋找其他線索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。

desc.en: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.jp: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.thai: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.ko: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.zh_tw: 老師在路上遇到了綾音，綾音表示要回學校準備還款，並且已經查清了便利店68的資料。這時無月突然出現，邀請老師帶便利屋68看看，被綾音呵斥候離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在路上遇到了绫音，绫音表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了便利店68的资料。这时睦月突然出现，邀请老师带便利屋68看看，被绫音呵斥候离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在路上遇到了绫音，绫音表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了便利店68的资料。这时无月突然出现，邀请老师带便利屋68看看，被绫音呵斥候离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在路上遇到了绫音，绫音表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了便利店68的资料。这时无月突然出现，邀请老师带便利屋68看看，被绫音呵斥候离开。

desc.en: Ayane found out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they were seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with caution. On the other hand, Ayane thought that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.
desc.jp: Ayane found out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they were seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with caution. On the other hand, Ayane thought that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.

On the other hand, Ayane thought that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.
desc.zh_tw: 綾音查清了便利屋68四人的資料，指出他們在格黑娜也被視為問題兒童，因而應多加小心。另一方面，綾音認為要想找到違禁武器的源頭，可能需要到黑市一趟。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音查清了便利屋68四人的资料，指出他们在格黑娜也被视为问题儿童，因而应多加小心。另一方面，绫音认为要想找到违禁武器的源头，可能需要到黑市一趟。

Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
